subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Michelle Wie will participate Thursday in the L.P.G.A.’s Sybase Match Play Championship in Gladstone, N.J., but her calendar also includes a commencement ceremony next month at Stanford.
snippet: Michelle Wie will participate Thursday in the L.P.G.A.’s Sybase Match Play Championship in Gladstone, N.J., but her calendar also includes a commencement ceremony next month at Stanford.
